author: andschwa
body: I cannot find where the changes made to `src/System.Management.Automation/engine/Utils.cs` with respect to `NativeEnumerateDirectory` are used outside of possibly remoting. This should be cleaned up.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
I'm going to close this. It does appear to be used during remoting, so I'd need @paulcallen to resolve this, and he's OOF for a while.

This is really a part of the larger diff review.

title: Revert NativeEnumerateDirectory changes
